cards.card_name: M02- Agnes Tachyon, Faster than Light
cards.rules_text:
Deathtouch
Whenever you cast your first noncreature spell each turn, look at the top card of each player's library and exile one of them. You may play that card for as long as it remains exiled, and may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast it.
Whenever you cast a spell, if you paid life, discarded a card or sacrificed a permanent to cast it, each opponent loses 3 life unless they discard a card or sacrifice a nonland permanent.

Trample
Whenever a land you control enters, creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain haste until end of turn.

At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a tapped food token. [i](It's an artifact with “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.”)[/i]
Whenever you gain life, M05- Oguri Cap, Starlight Beat gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the amount of life you gained.

Deathtouch, lifelink
Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, it gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of card types among permanents you control and cards in your graveyard.

At the beginning of your upkeep, each player mills a card. Then if a player has seven or more cards in their graveyard, M07- Nice Nature, Supporting Star accelerates. [i](If it hasn't accelerated yet, it gains it's {V} ability.)[/i]
{V} — Whenever M07- Nice Nature, Supporting Star accelerates, put target permanent card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

cards.card_name: M08- Zenno Rob Roy, Heroic Author
cards.rules_text: Whenever a nontoken creature you control enters, create a token that's a copy of it if you control another creature with equal power, toughness or mana value to that creature.

Prowess
Whenever you attack, each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard with mana value equal to an attacking creature's power gains jump-start until end of turn. [i](You may cast it from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile that card.)[/i]

Double strike
Whenever a creature you control with one or more counters on it dies, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. A spell cast this way costs {1} less to cast for each counter that creature had.

You may look at the top card of your library any time.
You may cast Horse spells from the top of your library.
Horse spells you cast cost {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} less to cast. This reduces only the amount of colored mana you pay.

Creatures you control get +1/+0.
At the beginning of your end step, you may draw a card.

{T}: Add one mana of the chosen color.

Horsemanship, lifelink

At the beginning of each end step, if you've gained life this turn, return up to one target permanent card from your graveyard to the battlefield if its mana value is less than or equal to the amount of life you've gained this turn.

Vigilance
When W07- enters, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
If a creature you control with one or more counters on it would be dealt damage, prevent that damage and remove a counter from it.

Other creatures you control get +1/+1.
Tokens you control enter as copies of W06-.

Other horses you control get +1/+1.

Whenever another creature you control enters, you gain 1 life. Then if you have 25 or more life, W02- accelerates. [i](If it hasn't accelerated yet, it gains it's {V} ability.)[/i]

First strike
